wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Homewood (25 September 1881 – 1 February 1945) was a British tug of war competitor who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. In 1908 he won the bronze medal as member of the British team Metropolitan Police "K" Division.He was killed during World War II when his home in Stratford, London was struck by a V2 rocket.
